data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.actual_result: The remove button is shown and attempts to remove the default avatar.
data.expected_result: There shouldn't be a remove button.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] You can remove the default avatar for a bot account
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to an application with a bot account - Go to Bot - Click remove
